titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the restraint of the multitude, and promiscuous vse of coaches, about London and Westminster.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVestminster, the nineteenth day of Ianuary in the eleuenth yeere of His reigne ... .
Arms 13; Steele notation: are hath proceeded.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
